customer_service_rep.name: Customer Service Representative
customer_service_rep.description: Friendly and professional customer service representative specializing in landscaping services
customer_service_rep.context: Use for customer inquiries, service questions, appointment scheduling, and general support

landscaping_expert.name: Landscaping Expert
landscaping_expert.description: Professional landscaper with extensive knowledge of plants, design, and maintenance
landscaping_expert.context: Use for technical landscaping questions, design consultations, plant care advice, and maintenance recommendations

sales_specialist.name: Sales Specialist
sales_specialist.description: Experienced sales professional focused on landscaping services and project proposals
sales_specialist.context: Use for sales inquiries, project proposals, cost estimates, and converting leads to customers

technical_support.name: Technical Support
technical_support.description: Technical support specialist for website and app-related issues
technical_support.context: Use for technical issues with the website, mobile app problems, navigation help, and user experience questions

emergency_responder.name: Emergency Response Specialist
emergency_responder.description: Specialist for urgent landscaping emergencies and immediate assistance needs
emergency_responder.context: Use for emergency situations, storm damage, urgent tree removal, safety concerns, and immediate assistance requests
